name: Roark Passage Anchors Stripe Boardshorts - Men's
description:
While chasing waves in Indonesia, the Roark team was inspired by traditional Ikat tapestries and these boardshorts were born.4-way stretch blend fabric.Packs into its own zippered thigh pocket.DWR finish keeps your shorts looking better between washes and makes them dry even quicker.Drawcord waist lets you snug in the perfect fit.Paneled construction for improved mobility.

        Sustainability
